# createNormalsIfAbsent

**Type Property**

An option for automatically generating surface normals if they are absent when loading geometry.

## Declaration

```swift
static let createNormalsIfAbsent: SCNSceneSource.LoadingOption
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing a Boolean value. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

To participate in lighting and shading, a geometry must include surface normal vectors in its vertex data. Some scene files may not contain such data. If you set this option’s value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], SceneKit applies heuristics to generate surface normal data for each geometry it loads from the scene source if such data is absent.
